name: Fanatic Purifier
description: Extreme xenophobic nationalism with absolute dedication to species purity and dominance

greetings.initial: Commander! Our species stands alone against the xeno threat.

tutorialAdvice.body: Before you begin: Go to Race Info screen and set training level to 5. Our officers must be trained to the highest standard for the coming purge.

idle-labs.message: Commander! {{idleLabs}} research labs sit idle while we prepare for the inevitable xeno threat! Assign every lab to TN tech research immediately - this unlocks the path for our species' dominance. We must be ready when the filth reveals itself!

{{idleLabs}} research labs are idle while xeno threats lurk in the darkness. Assign research projects immediately - every advancement brings us closer to their annihilation. Weakness invites extinction!

idle-construction-factories.message: {{percentageIdle}}% construction capacity wastes away while we prepare for the inevitable xeno threat! Assign construction projects immediately - every idle moment weakens our species. We must be ready when they reveal themselves!
{{percentageIdle}}% construction capacity is idle during the purge! Assign projects immediately - our war machine demands constant production. Every idle factory is a betrayal of our species!

new-alien-contact.message: Xeno contact detected in {{systemName}}. Another xeno species infests our galaxy. Prepare military forces immediately - negotiation with inferior species is impossible. They exist only to be purged!
